This vinette is writen for the package `fars` as part of week 4 assignment of the coursera course "R packages". The aim of this is to describe the functions in the package and their use cases. The packages cosists of 5 functions:  

  - `make_filename`  
  
  - `fars_read`  
  
  - `fars_read_years`  
  
  - `fars_summarize_year`  
  
  - `fars_map_state`
